channel.title: Add exp NPC
channel.description: Will someone please explain to me how to make Npc's give exp to a certain skill once attacked. e.g if someone attacked a rat they would receive 84 xp

item.title: Add exp NPC
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:3, topic:171221”][quote author=jac link=topic=231248.msg1979807#msg1979807 date=1199586931]
Will someone please explain to me how to make Npc’s give exp to a certain skill once attacked.
e.g if someone attacked a rat they would receive 84 xp
[/quote]

You can’t do it for just 1 certain npc…[/quote]

Lol, ya think?

Read full topic

item.title: Add exp NPC
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“jac, post:1, topic:171221”]Will someone please explain to me how to make Npc’s give exp to a certain skill once attacked.
e.g if someone attacked a rat they would receive 84 xp[/quote]

You can’t do it for just 1 certain npc…You can go into the Npc.cfg, and make it’s hp higher, so it will take more time to kill, and give more xp…But that’s all…I think there might be a way to, but I have never bothered with it.

Read full topic
